techs.name: Music
techs.quote: There was Eru, the One, who in Arda is called Il√∫vatar; and he made first the Ainur, the Holy Ones, that were the offspring of his thought, and they were with him before aught else was made. And he spoke to them, propounding to them themes of music; and they sang before him, and he was glad.
